operation.name: insert
operation.sql: INSERT INTO region (code, name, parent_code, level, sort_order, remark, has_children, raw_add_time) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

operation.name: update
operation.sql: UPDATE region SET code=?, name=?, parent_code=?, level=?, sort_order=?, has_children=?, remark=? WHERE id=?

operation.name: findByCondition
operation.sqlmap: SELECT * from region where 1=1 <dynamic> <isGreaterThan property="region.id" compareValue="0" prepend=" and "> id = #region.id# </isGreaterThan> <isGreaterThan property="region.level" compareValue="0" prepend=" and "> level = #region.level# </isGreaterThan> <isNotEmpty property="region.code" prepend=" and "> code = #region.code# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="region.parentCode" prepend=" and "> parent_code = #region.parentCode# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="region.name" prepend=" and "> name like concat('%',#region.name#,'%') </isNotEmpty> </dynamic> <isNotEmpty property="sortCol" prepend=" order by "> $sortCol$ <isNotEmpty property="sortOrder"> $sortOrder$ </isNotEmpty> </isNotEmpty> LIMIT #limitStart#,#pageSize#;

operation.name: findByConditionCount
operation.sqlmap: SELECT count(*) FROM region where 1=1 <dynamic> <isGreaterThan property="id" compareValue="0" prepend=" and "> id = #id# </isGreaterThan> <isGreaterThan property="level" compareValue="0" prepend=" and "> level = #level# </isGreaterThan> <isNotEmpty property="code" prepend=" and "> code = #code# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="parentCode" prepend=" and "> parent_code = #parentCode# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="name" prepend=" and "> name like concat('%',#name#,'%') </isNotEmpty> </dynamic>
